newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Rotterdam bunkers edge higher, but lag barge gains.
newsitem.headline: Rotterdam bunkers edge higher, but lag barge gains.

text.p: Rotterdam bunkers edged higher on Friday, but the move was a modest $1 a tonne, against the $2 rise of the barge market, dealers said.

Rotterdam bunkers were quoted at around $85 fob. Larger players picked up most of the business below that level. Some players, mainly independents, said they were unable to offer at lower than $86 fob.
"The big sellers were offering at incredibly low numbers compared with the ex-wharf numbers," one dealer said.
Total ARA volume exceeded 10,000 tonnes, including a couple of larger enquiries.
Hamburg prices were barely changed. Morning trading was reasonably busy before an afternoon lull.
Mediterranean barges also barely moved. Trading was quiet. Spanish suppliers remained on holiday.
Egyptian prices edged slightly higher. Supplies were good in all ports except Alexandria.
